item.title: By: Interior Trim Refinishing | Grand Mighty
item.dc:creator: Interior Trim Refinishing | Grand Mighty
item.description: […] The Dash Project was essentially a segue and gateway into a comprehensive interior overhaul. Since I had to remove the majority of the trim whilst working on the dash, I decided to go one step further and strip down each individual trim pieces. I felt that the black plastics were getting bland and decided to spice things up by having them repainted. […]
item.content:encoded: […] The Dash Project was essentially a segue and gateway into a comprehensive interior overhaul. Since I had to remove the majority of the trim whilst working on the dash, I decided to go one step further and strip down each individual trim pieces. I felt that the black plastics were getting bland and decided to spice things up by having them repainted. […]

item.title: By: albert

item.description: holy shit. you are one crazy dude eric. painting the dash crossmember? keep it coming...
